definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: (foolish—´[[א]] Job 5:2 +; pl. [[אֱוִילִים]] Ps 107:17 +, etc.;—foolish, Pr 29:9 (´[[אִישׁ א]]) Ho 9:7 (pred. of prophet); cf. Is 35:8, elsewhere

definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: fool (always morally bad), who despises wisdom & discipline Pr 1:7, Pr 15:5; mocks at guilt Pr 14:9; is quarrelsome Pr 20:3; licentious Pr 7:22; it is folly & useless to instruct him Pr 16:22, Pr 27:22 (19 t. Pr); cf. also Je 4:22, Job 5:2, Job 5:3, Is 19:11, Ps 107:17.
